Back to Test Page 1 with the Spring campaign

Clicking between this page and Test page 1 will initiate the actions to update the intsiSession cookie.
Open the browser console to see the current session data change as you :

  • navigate the session expiration will update
  • reload after the session expires to see the session id change
  • navigate to a url with a new campaign to see the session id change (we've provided handy links!)
  • keep the page open while midnight occurs to see a new session start with no pageload
  • clear cookies and reload to see a fresh session start (with the current campaign if there is one)
